A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The line Han says in episode 7 \"that's not how the force works\" can be applied to 7-10 scenes in this movie. I understand Rian Johnson wanted to take risks but there is a difference between taking risks and completely throwing away what made this Franchise what it is. Instead of continuing on what Star Wars was before\, they're simply going for the next dollar regardless of what is done with the story. But also making sure they push their clearly left wing political agenda as much as possible. I'm all for women and men being equal\, but that doesn't mean make the male villain and the male heroes so helpless. This movie deserves the awful audience reviews it's getting
